Plot: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.
Title: Transporter 3
Writer: Luc Besson, Robert Mark Kamen, Luc Besson (characters), Robert Mark Kamen (characters)
Actors: Jason Statham, Natalya Rudakova, François Berléand, Robert Knepper
tomatoConsensus: This middling installment in the Transporter franchise is a few steps down from its predecessors, featuring generic stunts and a lack of energy.
